name: nativescript-youtubeplayer-inline
description: YoutubePlayer for Nativescript with inline playing support

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-youtubeplayer && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-youtubeplayer && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.webpack.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && npm run start-android-bundle
scripts.demo.ng.webpack.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && npm run start-ios-bundle
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
